description: Values of B (the even leg) of a Pythagorean triangle with A and C both prime and part of a twin prime.
comments: All terms of the sequence must be part of a pythagorean triple of the form (2u-1), 2u*(u-1), (2u^2 - 2u + 1). - _Joshua Zucker_, May 11 2006
crossrefs: See A051642 for the A's and A051859 for the C's.
author: Stuart M. Ellerstein (ellerstein(AT)aol.com), Dec 14 1999
extensions: a(11) corrected by the author, Jun 03 2002
